      • getFamilyName

        public java.lang.String getFamilyName()
        Description copied from interface: IntentionAction
        Returns the name of the family of intentions. It is used to externalize "auto-show" state of intentions. When the user clicks on a light bulb in intention list, all intentions with the same family name get enabled/disabled. The name is also shown in settings tree.
        Specified by:
        getFamilyName in interface IntentionAction
        Specified by:
        getFamilyName in interface QuickFix<ProblemDescriptor>
        Returns:
        the intention family name.
        See Also:
        IntentionManager.registerIntentionAndMetaData(IntentionAction, String...)

      • startInWriteAction

        public boolean startInWriteAction()
        Description copied from interface: IntentionAction
        Indicate whether this action should be invoked inside write action. Should return false if, e.g., a modal dialog is shown inside the action. If false is returned the action itself is responsible for starting write action when needed, by calling Application.runWriteAction(Runnable).
        Specified by:
        startInWriteAction in interface IntentionAction
        Specified by:
        startInWriteAction in interface WriteActionAware
        Overrides:
        startInWriteAction in class LocalQuickFixAndIntentionActionOnPsiElement
        Returns:
        true if the intention requires a write action, false otherwise.

                     CommonProblemDescriptor [] descriptors,
                     java.util.List<PsiElement> psiElementsToIgnore,
                     java.lang.Runnable refreshViews)
        Description copied from interface: BatchQuickFix
        Called to apply the cumulative fix. Is invoked in WriteAction
        Specified by:
        applyFix in interface BatchQuickFix<CommonProblemDescriptor>
        Parameters:
        project - Project
        descriptors - problem reported by the tool on which fix should work
        psiElementsToIgnore - elements to be excluded from view during post-refresh
        refreshViews - post-refresh inspection results view; would remove collected elements from the view
